messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Due to the shift ending, break time is now. sleep, eat, or play! do whatever you want

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.
